item.title: LU
item.description: score:-11 Chances: Lufax Holding Ltd offers personal lending and wealth management solutions, positioning them well in the financial services market. The company’s technology-empowered platform provides a competitive edge and potential for growth. Potential for expansion in the small business owner market in China provides a promising opportunity for Lufax Holding Ltd.
